      • getFilteredPatterns

        public java.util.List<AccessPattern> getFilteredPatterns(boolean includeArchived,
                                                         java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                         java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                         java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                         java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method applies the given filter options to an access pattern query. Include archived / wildcard / datetime range / limit are applied if not null (with AND linkage).
        Specified by:
        getFilteredPatterns in interface IArtDbContext
        Parameters:
        includeArchived - a flag that indicates whether the archived whitelists are also included
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of whitelist matching the given filter options
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getRelatedFilteredCriticalAccessQueries

        public java.util.List<CriticalAccessQuery> getRelatedFilteredCriticalAccessQueries(CriticalAccessQuery query,
                                                                                   boolean includeArchived,
                                                                                   java.lang.String wildcard,
                                                                                   java.time.ZonedDateTime start,
                                                                                   java.time.ZonedDateTime end,
                                                                                   java.lang.Integer limit)
                                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method selects all already executed sap queries from the local database. The filters are applied as in the getFilteredCriticalAccessQueries() method.
        Specified by:
        getRelatedFilteredCriticalAccessQueries in interface IArtDbContext
        Parameters:
        query - the query to be related to
        includeArchived - determines whether archived records are also loaded
        wildcard - the wildcard string that is searched in several text attributes of whitelists
        start - the lower limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        end - the upper limit of the whitelist creation timestamp to be filtered
        limit - the limit of records returned
        Returns:
        a list of already executed sap queries
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deleteConfig

        public void deleteConfig(Configuration config)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing configuration from the local database. Referenced table entries are not deleted. If the config has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Specified by:
        deleteConfig in interface IArtDbContext
        Parameters:
        config - the configuration to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deletePattern

        public void deletePattern(AccessPattern pattern)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method deletes an existing access pattern from the local database. Referenced table entries are also deleted. If the pattern has already been used in sap queries, the history flag is set instead of deleting.
        Specified by:
        deletePattern in interface IArtDbContext
        Parameters:
        pattern - the access pattern to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - caused by unauthorized access (e.g. missing privileges, wrong login credentials, etc.)

      • deleteWhitelist

        public void deleteWhitelist(Whitelist whitelist)
